verses.verse: This <WG2532> is the Revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> gave <WG1325> him <WG846> to show <WG1166> to his <WG846> servants <WG1401> the things which <WG3739> must <WG1163> happen soon, <WG1096> <WG1722> which <WG2532> he sent <WG649> and <WG2532> made known <WG4591> by <WG1223> his <WG846> angel <WG32> to his <WG846> servant, <WG1401> John, <WG2491>
who <WG3739> testified <WG3140> to God <WG2316>'s word, <WG3056> and <WG2532> of the testimony <WG3141> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> about <WG5037> everything that <WG3745> he saw. <WG1492>

Blessed <WG3107> is he who reads <WG314> and <WG2532> those who hear <WG191> the words <WG3056> of the prophecy, <WG4394> and <WG2532> keep <WG5083> the things that are written <WG1125> in <WG1722> it, <WG846> for <WG1063> the time <WG2540> is at hand. <WG1451>

John, <WG2491> to the <WG1577> seven <WG2033> assemblies <WG1577> that are in <WG1722> Asia: <WG773> Grace <WG5485> to you <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace, <WG1515> from <WG575> God, <WG5607> who is and <WG2532> who was <WG2258> and <WG2532> who is to come; <WG2064> and <WG2532> from <WG575> the <WG4151> seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> who <WG3739> are <WG2076> before <WG1799> his <WG846> throne; <WG2362>

and <WG2532> from <WG575> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> the faithful <WG4103> witness, <WG3144> the firstborn <WG4416> of <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> the ruler <WG758> of the kings <WG935> of the earth. <WG1093> To him who loves <WG25> us, <WG2248> and <WG2532> washed <WG3068> us <WG2248> from <WG575> our <WG2257> sins <WG266> by <WG1722> his <WG846> blood; <WG129>

and <WG2532> he made <WG4160> us <WG2248> to be a Kingdom, <WG935> <WG2532> priests <WG2409> to his <WG846> God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father; <WG3962> to him <WG846> be the glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> the dominion <WG2904> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

Behold, <WG2400> he is coming <WG2064> with <WG3326> the clouds, <WG3507> and <WG2532> every <WG3956> eye <WG3788> will see <WG3700> him, <WG846> including <WG2532> those who <WG3748> pierced <WG1574> him. <WG846> <WG2532> All <WG3956> the tribes <WG5443> of the earth <WG1093> will mourn <WG2875> over <WG1909> him. <WG846> Even so, <WG3483> Amen. <WG281>

"I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the Alpha <WG1> and <WG2532> the Omega, <WG5598>" says <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962> God, <WG5607> "who is and <WG2532> who was <WG2258> and <WG2532> who is to come, <WG2064> the Almighty. <WG3841>"

I <WG1473> John, <WG2491> <WG2532> your <WG5216> brother <WG80> and <WG2532> partner <WG4791> with you in <WG1722> oppression, <WG2347> <WG2532> <WG1722> Kingdom, <WG932> and <WG2532> perseverance <WG5281> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> was <WG1096> on <WG1722> the isle <WG3520> that is called <WG2564> Patmos <WG3963> because <WG1223> of God <WG2316>'s Word <WG3056> and <WG2532> <WG1223> the testimony <WG3141> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

I was <WG1096> in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151> on <WG1722> the <WG2250> Lord <WG2960>'s day, <WG2250> and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> behind <WG3694> me <WG3450> a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> like <WG5613> a trumpet <WG4536>

saying, <WG3004> "What <WG3739> you see, <WG991> write <WG1125> in <WG1473> a book <WG975> and <WG2532> send <WG3992> to the seven <WG2033> assemblies: <WG1577> to <WG1519> Ephesus, <WG2181> Smyrna, <WG4667> Pergamum, <WG4010> Thyatira, <WG2363> Sardis, <WG4554> Philadelphia, <WG5359> and <WG2532> to <WG1519> Laodicea. <WG2993>"

<WG2532> I turned <WG1994> to see <WG991> the voice <WG5456> that <WG3748> spoke <WG2980> with <WG3326> me. <WG1700> <WG2532> Having turned, <WG1994> I saw <WG1492> seven <WG2033> golden lampstands. <WG5552>

And <WG2532> <WG1722> among <WG3319> the <WG2033> lampstands <WG3087> was one like <WG3664> a son <WG5207> of man, <WG444> clothed <WG1746> with a robe reaching down to his feet, <WG4158> and <WG2532> with a golden <WG5552> <WG99999> sash <WG2223> around <WG4314> his chest. <WG3149>

<WG846> His <WG846> head <WG2776> and <WG2532> his hair <WG2359> were white <WG3022> as <WG5613> white <WG3022> wool, <WG2053> like snow. <WG5510> <WG2532> His <WG846> eyes <WG3788> were like <WG5613> a flame <WG5395> of fire. <WG1161>

<WG2532> His <WG846> feet <WG4228> were like <WG3664> burnished brass, <WG5474> as if <WG5613> it had been refined <WG4448> in <WG1722> a furnace. <WG2575> <WG2532> His <WG846> voice <WG5456> was like <WG5613> the voice <WG5456> of <WG5204> many <WG4183> waters. <WG5204>

<WG2532> He had <WG2192> seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> in <WG1722> his <WG846> right <WG1188> hand. <WG5495> <WG2532> Out of <WG1537> his <WG846> mouth <WG4750> proceeded <WG1607> a sharp <WG3691> two-edged <WG1366> sword. <WG4501> <WG2532> His <WG846> face <WG3799> was like <WG5613> the sun <WG2246> shining <WG5316> at <WG1722> its <WG846> brightest. <WG1411>

<WG2532> When <WG3753> I saw <WG1492> him, <WG846> I fell <WG4098> at <WG4314> his <WG846> feet <WG4228> like <WG5613> a dead <WG3498> man. <WG2532> He laid <WG2007> his <WG846> right <WG1188> hand <WG5495> on <WG1909> me, <WG1691> saying, <WG3004> <WG3427> "Don't <WG3361> be afraid. <WG5399> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> the first <WG4413> and <WG2532> the last, <WG2078>

and <WG2532> the Living <WG2198> one. <WG2532> I was <WG1096> dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> I am <WG1510> alive <WG2198> forevermore. <WG1519> <WG165> Amen. <WG281> <WG2532> I have <WG2192> the keys <WG2807> of Death <WG2532> and <WG2532> of Hades. <WG86>

Write <WG1125> therefore the things which <WG3739> you have seen, <WG1492> and <WG2532> the things which <WG3739> are, <WG1526> and <WG2532> the things which <WG3739> will <WG3195> happen <WG1096> <WG3326> hereafter; <WG5023>

the mystery <WG3466> of the seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> which <WG3739> you saw <WG1492> in <WG1909> my <WG3450> right hand, <WG1188> and <WG2532> the seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> lampstands. <WG3087> The seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> are <WG1526> the angels <WG32> of the seven <WG2033> assemblies. <WG1577> <WG2532> The seven <WG2033> lampstands <WG3087> <WG3739> <WG1492> are <WG1526> seven <WG2033> assemblies. <WG1577>"
